about_the_game:
Gain items and accessories inspired by the Vtuber group "Electronic Fairy Project" and the Vtuber "Kokounoakumu-Nightmare-".

・Themed recovery items x 50 (per Vtuber)
・Themed masks x 3 (per Vtuber)
・Themed accessories x 3 (per Vtuber)
・Special "X" Cube for each member of "Electronic Fairy Project"
・ Special "Kokounoakumu-Nightmare- X" Cube x 1

*In order to receive a Vtuber's Special "X" Cube, you need to have rescued the respective character first.
detailed_description:
Gain items and accessories inspired by the Vtuber group "Electronic Fairy Project" and the Vtuber "Kokounoakumu-Nightmare-".

・Themed recovery items x 50 (per Vtuber)
・Themed masks x 3 (per Vtuber)
・Themed accessories x 3 (per Vtuber)
・Special "X" Cube for each member of "Electronic Fairy Project"
・ Special "Kokounoakumu-Nightmare- X" Cube x 1

*In order to receive a Vtuber's Special "X" Cube, you need to have rescued the respective character first.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 670 or AMD Radeon HD 7970 / R9 280X
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 Home (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Geforce GTX 1060 3GB or AMD Radeon RX 580
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: Optimal 4k performance may require better than Recommended System Requirements
